</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Defines an action performed when [[High Command|high command]] group selection has been changed.
<br>
Command receives 2 variables:
*_group: [[Group]] - last selected/deselected group
*_isSelected: [[Boolean]] - new selection state of the specific group

The code is executed on every [[High Command|hc]] group selection change until it is
* removed via <code>[[onHCGroupSelectionChanged]] "";</code> or <code>[[onHCGroupSelectionChanged]] {};</code>
* or replaced by <code>[[onHCGroupSelectionChanged]] "SomeOtherCommand(s)";</code> or <code>[[onHCGroupSelectionChanged]] {SomeOtherCommand(s)};</code>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Since '''Arma 3''' ''v1.57'' a stackable version of this EH is available: [[Arma_3:_Event_Handlers/addMissionEventHandler#HCGroupSelectionChanged|HCGroupSelectionChanged]]</value></part></template></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''onHCGroupSelectionChanged''' command </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> command: [[String]] or [[Code]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[onHCGroupSelectionChanged]] {
  [[if]] (_isSelected) [[then]] {
    [[hint]] [[format]] ["Group %1 has been selected.", _group];
  } [[else]] {
    [[hint]] [[format]] ["Group %1 has been deselected.", _group];
  };
};</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
